## Sausage roll
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)


### Sausage Rolls
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

#### Ingredients
- Base mix (see below)
- Italian herbs >>>
- Paprika >>>
- Cumin >>
- Cayenne Pepper >
- Cinnamon >
- Cardamon (ground) >
- Salt >>
- Pepper >>
- Curry powder >
- Corriander (ground) >>
- Oil
- bread 2 slices torn into small pieces
- Puff pastry
- Almond milk
- Sesame seeds

#### Steps
1. Use one portion of base mix. Add herbs, spices and bread and mix together. Add oil and stir thoroughly.
1. Put mince onto pastry and roll. Top with almond milk and sesame seeds Cook in oven at 200C for 25 mins (time will depend on oven heat and roll size).

### Bean, tofu and egplant base mix
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

#### Ingredients
- beans (2x cans; a combination of red + black are good)
- Small can of chickpeas
- tofu (200g)
- Eggplant
- onion
- garlic
- oil

#### Steps
1. Finely slice eggplant, rub with salt and let sit for around 20 mins.
1. Chop onion into small pieces and cook until translucent. Chop eggplant into small pieces and add. Once eggplant is soft, add  minced garlic.
1. Separately, mince beans and chickpeas with a fork until they forms a soft paste, with some chunks remaining. Mince tofu with a fork and add. Finely slice onion and garlic.
1. Add the onion/eggplant mixture and stir to combine.

### Bean and tofu base mix
[![Lifecycle: deprecated](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-deprecated-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#deprecated)

#### Ingredients
- beans (2x cans)
- tofu (200g)
- onion
- garlic
- oil

#### Steps
1. Mince beans with a fork or blender until forms a soft paste, with some chunks remaining. Mince tofu with a fork. Finely slice onion and garlic.
1. Stir ingredients together.

### Bean and eggplant base mix

[![Lifecycle: deprecated](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-deprecated-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#deprecated)

#### Ingredients
- eggplant
- onion
- garlic
- oil
- beans (2x cans)

#### Steps
1. Slice eggplant and rub with salt. Wait 20 mins.
1. Finely dice eggplant, onion and garlic.
1. Brown onion, then add eggplant and allow to soften. Then add garlic.
1. Mince beans into a smoothish paste. Add to the onion/eggplant mixture. Add additional oil if required.


### Mushroom and eggplant
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

#### Ingredients
- Mushrooms (200g)
- Eggplant
- Onion
- Garlic
- Chilli
- Oil
- Butter

#### Steps

1. Slice eggplant and rub with salt. Wait 30 mins.
1. In separate batches, blend mushrooms, eggplant, onion, garlic and chilli in a blender.
1. Brown onion in oil. Add butter and salt, once melted add mushrooms and allow to brown.
1. Make space in pan, add more oil if needed and add garlic and Chilli. Stir in side of pan until ready then mix into remaining mixture.
